judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The opinion of Judge Gest, confirmed by the court in banc, fully sets forth and correctly disposes of the question involved in this appeal. The decree of the lower court is affirmed on that opinion, at costs of the estate.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Shippen Lewis, with him Richard W. Ledwith, for appellant.
Cuthbert H. Latta, Jr., of Williams, Brittain & Sinclair, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Austin’s Estate.
Argued April 16, 1934.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
Shippen Lewis, with him Richard W. Ledwith, for appellant.
June 30, 1934:
Cuthbert H. Latta, Jr., of Williams, Brittain & Sinclair, for appellees.
